channel.title: ggplot2 on Pete Talbert
channel.description: Recent content in ggplot2 on Pete Talbert

item.title: COVID-19 New York Times plots
item.description: The New York Times has produced some really great maps and plots in its efforts to track the coronavirus in the U.S. One plot in particular that caught my attention is the histogram (actually more like a bar plot) of new cases with a 7-day average line overlayed found at the top of this page.

item.title: ggplot2 geom_bar Labeling
item.description: In educational data analysis, I am constantly looking at counts and proportions. Iâ€™ve found the easiest way to display these results with categorical variables like demographics is to use stacked bar charts and especially 100% stacked charts.
